publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1255 Bristow Muldoon on behalf of the Selection Panel: Appointment of the Commissioner for Public Appointments in Scotland-That the Parliament nominates Karen Carlton to Her Majesty The Queen for appointment as the Commissioner for Public Appointments in Scotland.
S2M-1255 Appointment of the Commissioner for Public Appointments in Scotland (lodged on 4 May 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*, Mike Pringle*
